text: You're the Worst is an American comedy-drama television series created by Stephen Falk. It was first shown on FX in 2014. From 2015 to 2019 it was shown on FXX. ==Synopsis== The series is about the relationship and lives of Jimmy Shive-Overly and his girlfriend Gretchen Cutler, The series is also about the lives of Jimmy's best friend Edgar Quintero and Gretchen's best friend Lindsay Jillian. == Characters == *Jimmy Shive-Overly (played by Chris Geere) is the show's main character. He is British and his job is being a writer. *Gretchen Cutler (played by Aya Cash) is the show's main character. She is American and her job is being a public relations executive, She has clinical depression. *Edgar Quintero (played by Desmin Borges), is an Iraq War veteran with Post Traumatic Stress Disorder, He is Jimmy's best friend and roommate. *Lindsay Jillian (played by Kether Donohue) is Gretchen's best friend. ==Series Overview== Season Episodes Season premiere Season finale 1 10 July 17, 2014 September 18, 2014 2 13 September 9, 2015 December 9, 2015 3 13 August 31, 2016 November 16, 2016 4 13 September 6, 2017 November 15, 2017 5 13 January 9, 2019 April 3, 2019 ==Episodes== ===Season 1 (2014)=== ===Season 2 (2015)=== ===Season 3 (2016)=== ===Season 4 (2017)=== ===Season 5 (2019)=== == References == == Other websites == * * Category:2014 American television series debuts Category:American comedy-drama television series Category:Mental disorders in fiction Category:Narcissism in fiction Category:English-language television programs
title: You're the Worst
